thread.title: Shreya Ghoshal to perform live at Trivandrum
thread.title_full: Shreya Ghoshal to perform live at Trivandrum - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Shreya Ghoshal to perform live at Trivandrum
text:
Shreya Ghoshal who has gifted Malayalis so many unforgettable songs is going to perform in the capital city for the first time on November 28.
The singer will join Composer M. Jayachandran's show, 'Jayaragangal'. It is their combination that has given Mollywood many beautiful songs.
